    • Method Detail

      • prefTable

        public static int[][] prefTable(java.util.LinkedList<java.util.Queue<Candidate>> list,
                                java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> cands)
        Returns a preference table. prefTable[i][j] has the number of ballots that prefer candidate i to candidate j in cands list
        Parameters:
        list - list of ballots
        cands - list of candidates
        Returns:
        returns int[][] containing preference counts

      • prefTablePerc

        public static double[][] prefTablePerc(java.util.LinkedList<java.util.Queue<Candidate>> list,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> cands)
        Returns a preference table. prefTable[i][j] has the percentage of ballots that prefer candidate i to candidate j in cands list, relative to the percentage of ballots that prefer candidate j to candidate i. Rounds to the nearest tenth of a percent.
        Parameters:
        list - list of ballots
        cands - list of candidates
        Returns:
        returns int[][] containing preference percentages
